◆ computeForcePerLeg()

Eigen::Vector4d utilFunction::computeForcePerLeg ( std::vector< std::string >  contact_points,
Eigen::VectorXd  forces,
bool  print_debug = false 
)
inline

Function to extract the force values for each leg.

Parameters
contact_points- name of the contact_points to be used for header frames
forces- vector with force in x,y,z direction for each leg
print_debug- enable print statements. Turned off by default
Returns
Eigen::Vector4d - Vector of shape 4x1 having the magnitude of force in each leg

aliengo_dynamics_computer::ReactionForce &  leg_forces 
)
inline

Function to extract component forces in x,y,z direction from force vector.

Parameters
contact_points- Name of the contact points of force
force_vector- vector containing the component force values for all leg
leg_forces- Reference variable to store the extracted force values
Returns
none
